lead_paragraph: Four children in the Rev. Joey Crutcher’s life are dead. Policing, health and crime were causes. But their race may also have played a part.

headline.print_headline: Identity Politics and a Dad’s Loss
headline.main: Identity Politics and a Dad’s Loss

snippet: Four children in the Rev. Joey Crutcher’s life are dead. Policing, health and crime were causes. But their race may also have played a part....
abstract: Nicholas D Kristof Op-Ed column addresses complaints that Democratic party has lost support by focusing on 'identity politics' and struggles of various minorities over American economy and concerns of working-class whites; cites police shooting death of black man Terrence Crutcher in Oklahoma and previous deaths of four other family members as example of very real struggles related to race; says Democrats should focus on both identity and economic ills, not just one or the other.
